H0.text: To become famous is the most important reason for scientists to publish their data and findings that result from a scientific investigation.

H1.text: To get paid for their research is the most important reason for scientists to publish their data and findings that result from a scientific investigation.

H2.text: To allow other scientists to try to replicate their results is the most important reason for scientists to publish the data and findings that result from a scientific investigation.

H3.text: To gain respect from their peers in the scientific community is the most important reason for scientists to publish their data and findings that result from a scientific investigation.

A4.text: researchers must archive their data and methods so that other researchers can test the data and methods and build on the research that has gone before
